activities: MyBuys provides services to facilitate the delivery of relevant advertising based on anonymous data about Web viewing behaviors and, when submitted by consumers, e-mail addresses.
personaldata: email addresses and shopping interest data
privacyprograms: DAA - we are members and adhere to the self regulation policies of the DAA
recoursemech: Interested parties who believe that their inquiries to MyBuys have not been satisfactorily addressed are invited to contact the DMA Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program.  The DMA will then work with MyBuys to resolve concerns.
